trans-unit.source: No running AppHost found. Use 'aspire run' to start one first.
trans-unit.target: No running AppHost found. Use 'aspire run' to start one first.

trans-unit.source: Display logs from resources in a running Aspire apphost.
trans-unit.target: Display logs from resources in a running Aspire apphost.

trans-unit.source: Stream logs in real-time as they are written.
trans-unit.target: Stream logs in real-time as they are written.

trans-unit.source: No AppHosts found in current directory. Showing all running AppHosts.
trans-unit.target: No AppHosts found in current directory. Showing all running AppHosts.

trans-unit.source: The path to the Aspire AppHost project file.
The name of the resource to get logs for. If not specified, logs from all resources are shown.
trans-unit.target: The name of the resource to get logs for. If not specified, logs from all resources are shown.

trans-unit.source: A resource name is required when not using --follow. Use --follow to stream logs from all resources.
trans-unit.target: A resource name is required when not using --follow. Use --follow to stream logs from all resources.

trans-unit.source: The --tail value must be a positive number.
trans-unit.target: The --tail value must be a positive number.

trans-unit.source: Number of lines to show from the end of logs (default: all).
trans-unit.target: Number of lines to show from the end of logs (default: all).

trans-unit.source: The --tail option requires a resource name to be specified.
trans-unit.target: The --tail option requires a resource name to be specified.
